definition: to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish

sentences.english: Kim Yaqian suction aspiration nose, hand- wipe the tears off his face.
sentences.chinese: 金亚倩吸吸鼻子，用手擦拭掉自己脸上的泪痕。

sentences.english: Also, mop your bathroom floor once a week with a bleach-based cleanser.
sentences.chinese: 每周还应用漂白清洁剂擦拭浴室地板。

sentences.english: The woman wiped away her tears and listened to Katyayana carefully.
sentences.chinese: 妇人把眼泪擦拭一下，望着迦旃延。

sentences.english: When removing mascara, brush from inner side of the eyelashes to the outer side.
sentences.chinese: 卸除睫毛膏要从根部向梢部擦拭。

sentences.english: Be like suffer sootiness and make partial wall paper becomes yellow, criterion appropriate is wiped with fluid of attenuant caustic soda.
sentences.chinese: 若受烟熏而使部分墙纸变黄，则宜用稀释烧碱液擦拭。

sentences.english: Thus, limits for both MACO and swabs should be set.
sentences.chinese: 因此，应同时设定MACO限度和擦拭限度。

sentences.english: Do wipe the rubber clean with a damp cloth if the shoes get dirty.
sentences.chinese: 如果您的登山鞋脏了，要用湿抹布擦拭橡胶部分。

sentences.english: Wipe clean with a damp cloth.
One drop of Lemon essential oil on a soft cloth will polish copper with a gentle buffing .
sentences.chinese: 用加了一滴柠檬油的软布轻轻擦拭铜器可以为它抛光。

sentences.english: All excess glue around dowels, joints, etc. will be wiped clean.
sentences.chinese: 榫头及接合处过量多余的胶人擦拭干净。

sentences.english: First wipe, and then re-use of water to get rid of the wet rags rub detergent.
sentences.chinese: 先擦拭，然后再用清水湿擦布擦除掉洗涤剂。

sentences.english: And clean the monitor often with an antistatic dust cloth.
sentences.chinese: 此外，要经常用防静电除尘布擦拭显示器。

sentences.english: When the panel surface is soiled, wipe it with absorbent cotton or other soft cloth.
sentences.chinese: 面板表面弄脏时，用脱脂棉或其他软布擦拭。

sentences.english: In hot water with a little vinegar, then dip in with soft cloth vinegar water wipe gently.
sentences.chinese: 在热水中加入少许食醋，然后用软布蘸醋水轻轻擦拭。

sentences.english: Shunde suddenly flow nosebleed, WuHuaLan with cotton-wool assist shunde wipe clean.
sentences.chinese: 顺德突然流鼻血，吴华兰用药棉协助顺德擦拭洁净。

sentences.english: The pupil's exercise was full of erasures.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生的作业练习到处都是擦拭的痕迹。

definition: to clean (with water or alcohol)/to wipe and wash/to swab/to scrub
to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish
to moisten/to dampen/to be steeped in/to be imbued with
to smear/to wipe/to erase/classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
to swab/to wipe up with a mop
